remarks.format: ## Remarks この がそれ自体が以前に `Clone` を呼び出したとき、または `Clone`の以前の呼び出しの出力であった別の 内に含まれている値である場合、このメソッドは追加のメモリ割り当てを行いません。If this is itself the output of a previous call to `Clone` or a value contained within another that was the output of a previous call to `Clone`, this method results in no additional memory allocation.

Public Function GetProperty (utf8PropertyName As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)) As JsonElement

param.name: utf8PropertyName
param.span: The UTF-8 representation (with no Byte-Order-Mark (BOM)) of the name of the property to return.

summary.span: Gets a representing the value of a required property identified by .

span.span: Gets a representing the value of a required property identified by .

returns.span: A representing the value of the requested property.

span.span: A representing the value of the requested property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks プロパティ名の一致は、序数の大文字と小文字を区別する比較として実行されます。Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison. 同じオブジェクトに対してプロパティが複数回定義されている場合、メソッドは、そのような最後の定義と一致します。If a property is defined multiple times for the same object, the method matches the last such definition. 詳細については、「 [JSON をシリアル化および逆シリアル化する方法](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md#use-jsondocument-for-access-to-data)」を参照してください。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md#use-jsondocument-for-access-to-data).

span.span: This value's is not .

exception.span: No property was found with the requested name.

public: bool TryGetProperty(ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> utf8PropertyName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Text::Json::JsonElement % value);

param.name: utf8PropertyName
param.span: The UTF-8 (with no Byte-Order-Mark (BOM)) representation of the name of the property to return.

span.span: The UTF-8 (with no Byte-Order-Mark (BOM)) representation of the name of the property to return.

param.name: value
param.span: Receives the value of the located property.

span.span: Receives the value of the located property.

summary.span: Looks for a property named in the current object, returning a value that indicates whether or not such a property exists.

span.span: Looks for a property named in the current object, returning a value that indicates whether or not such a property exists.

summary.span: When the property exists, the method assigns its value to the argument.

span.span: When the property exists, the method assigns its value to the argument.

returns.span: if the property was found; otherwise, .

span.span: if the property was found; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks プロパティ名の一致は、序数の大文字と小文字を区別する比較として実行されます。Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison. 同じオブジェクトに対してプロパティが複数回定義されている場合、メソッドは、そのような最後の定義と一致します。If a property is defined multiple times for the same object, the method matches the last such definition. 詳細については、「 [JSON をシリアル化および逆シリアル化する方法](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md#use-jsondocument-for-access-to-data)」を参照してください。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md#use-jsondocument-for-access-to-data).

span.span: if the string value of this element has the same UTF-8 encoding as ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks このメソッドは、を呼び出した結果を使用して、UTF-8 デコード `utf8Text` によって生成される文字列の序数比較を実行するのと同じように機能しますが、文字列インスタンスの作成は回避されます。This method is functionally equal to doing an ordinal comparison of the string produced by UTF-8 decoding `utf8Text` with the result of calling , but avoids creating the string instances.
